alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:48PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Niobrara and northeastern Converse Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1047 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dull Center, or 37 miles southeast of Wright, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dull Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
